overview: Who needs to go on the prowl for a boyfriend or a casual date when you've got friends who are sexed up specimens of gorgeousness and who are more than willing to fulfil not only your sexual needs, but their own as well -- these are the Boys Banging Friends! After losing the match, three soccer pals console each other with passionate kisses, deep-throat dick sucking and bareback fucking whilst some army pals on late night manoeuvres are locked, loaded and more than ready to discharge their meaty weapons -- into each other! Now that's what you call friends with benefits!
title: Boys Banging Friends
